dimensions: 19.4 x 20.3 cm (7 5/8 x 8 in. ), at widest point
title: Screen Design:  "Voodoo for Peace," Reverse Side
medium: Black and red marking pen (?), crayon (?) on white tracing paper
description: Four panel screen in the form of four figure-like forms.  Upper half of figures is white with green, pink, yellow, green, and blue shaded areas along upper contours and adjacent to triangular shapes on torsos.  Each figure wears black girdle with red and white striped skirts. This design is cut along outside contours from a larger sheet.
name: Drawing
